Articles.Content: Okay so anyone have any idea when r4m0n will have mechjeb .23 compatible? I know of the dev build my but also know its not a full mj.....

Uh, no. Sarbian's been maintaining MJ for months and months; the only reason there isn't a full release AFAIK is that only r4m0n can edit the opening post

Which he just did, so...

If you get the latest version of MechJeb it works perfectly fine (not the one on the MechJeb thread's op, find it on the MechJeb Jenkins page). Also, KerbPaint requires a patch by Tenneko (find it on page 30 of the KerbPaint thread) to work with all the stock parts.

Also, make sure you are running KSP with the proper user permissions to get anything to work.

Edited April 6, 2014 by DragonDude
Changed suggestion
